Translations.Text: vemen azlemu mimmen zukkira biayati rabbihi summe a`rada `anha. inna mine-lmucrimine muntekimun
velekad ateyna muse-lkitabe fela tekun fi miryetim mil likaehi vece`alnahu hudel libeni israil
vece`alna minhum eimmetey yehdune biemrina lemma saberu. vekanu biayatina yukinun
inne rabbeke huve yefsilu beynehum yevme-lkiyameti fima kanu fihi yahtelifun
evelem yehdi lehum kem ehlekna min kablihim mine-lkuruni yemsune fi mesakinihim. inne fi zalike leayat. efela yesme`un
evelem yerav enna nesuku-lmae ile-l'ardi-lcuruzi fenuhricu bihi zer`an te'kulu minhu en`amuhum veenfusuhum. efela yubsirun
veyekulune meta haze-lfethu in kuntum sadikin
kul yevme-lfethi la yenfe`u-llezine keferu imanuhum vela hum yunzarun
